channel.title: [Class Suggestion] Trapper (BD) Pursuer (Unseen)
channel.description:
> [color=lighblue]Trapper, BD, Killer :dagger: [/color] > = > > Passive 1: Gone Insane! - Immune to occupation/redirection. > > Passive 2: Wild Instincts - Your deathtrap inform you if an evil (not killer) has visited your target (Evil: Unseen, Cult, Scorned, Evil/Neut King) > > Day Ability 1: Refined Trap - Make you're deathtrap tonight go through death immunity. 1 use. If you get jailed tonight or don't use it, it will not be used > > Night Ability 1: Death Trap - Put a trap outside a player's house. Killing any killer visiting him and preventing the kill. Player will not be informed unless a killer visited him. Can be used on King. 3 use.
I added the trapper as more claim space for the evils I thought having a class like hunter but giving a bear to another player would be cool.
> [color=lapurple] Pursuer, Unseen, Offensive [/color] > = > Passive 1: Crazy Mind! - Immune to occupation/redirection. > > Night Ability 1: Fake Trap Alert - It will give you're target a fake message saying "You have been saved by a trap!" 2 use. > > Night Ability 2: Special Disguise - When a person sees the assassin visiting someone they will see you instead. 3 use. > >I'm open to hear any feedback/suggestions on this class.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Trapper (BD) Pursuer (Unseen)
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
Okay so some people have been saying that trapper’s weak compared to ToS’s trapper (which I did not even base it on)

So yes I’m going to give a poll for a new ability

Night Ability 2: Master Trap - Put a trap on a player’s house that will stay forever on you’re target until you get killed/converted or if it is triggered by a killer. It will kill the killer visiting but the player who was visited will also die. 1 use

Passive 2: Cunning Trap - Your deathtrap inform you if an evil (not killer) has visited your target (Evil: Unseen, Cult, Scorned, Evil/Neut King)

So which ability/passive do you want?

  • Cunning Trap
  • Master Trap
  • None
  • I like the class as is

0 voters

Edit will not put this up top

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Trapper (BD) Pursuer (Unseen)
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
Twil1ight:

Actually it more fits to NK claim’s than Unseen/Cult claims because of immunity to occupation/redirection, otherwise he don’t need this like you’re would be sit down and do nothing throught most of nights.

I just hope you would can only have one trap, i mean multiple traps could be OP in some situations(If there is only Assassin left and 2/3 people are trapped).

Yeah I kinda meant for all evils, Yup it’s not like ToS’s trapper that can have multiple traps down at one time

Twil1ight:

Also i have question, can you put trap on King?

Yes you could

Twil1ight:

So he’s basically Assassin’s sidekick and first taking a hit in case of Observer. I mean his 2 Night Ability seems to be most of the time wasted and even useless if there is no Observer’s in game especially with only two uses of Special Disguise.

Yup he is xd, I could increase the uses to 3 or unlimited if needed

Twil1ight:

Overall, simple and reasonable concept for class. The only i would attach is importance of “Special Disguise”, because it don’t seem to be even good.

Thanks!

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Trapper (BD) Pursuer (Unseen)
item.dc:creator: Twil1ight
item.description:
Htm:

Trapper, BD, Killer
Passive 1: Gone Insane! - Immune to occupation/redirection.

Day Ability 1: Refined Trap - Make you’re deathtrap tonight go through death immunity. 1 use. If you get jailed tonight or don’t use it, it will not be used

Night Ability 1: Death Trap - Put a trap outside a player’s house. Killing any killer visiting him and preventing the kill. Player will not be informed unless a killer visited him. 3 use.

Actually it more fits to NK claim’s than Unseen/Cult claims because of immunity to occupation/redirection, otherwise he don’t need this like you’re would be sit down and do nothing throught most of nights.
I just hope you would can only have one trap, i mean multiple traps could be OP in some situations(If there is only Assassin left and 2/3 people are trapped).
Also i have question, can you put trap on King?

Htm:

Pursuer, Unseen, Offensive
Passive 1: Crazy Mind! - Immune to occupation/redirection.

Night Ability 1: Fake Trap Alert - It will give you’re target a fake message saying “You have been saved by a trap!” 2 use.

Night Ability 2: Special Disguise - When a person sees the assassin visiting someone they will see you instead. 2 use.

So he’s basically Assassin’s sidekick and first taking a hit in case of Observer. I mean his 2 Night Ability seems to be most of the time wasted and even useless if there is no Observer’s in game especially with only two uses of Special Disguise.

Overall, simple and reasonable concept for class. The only i would attach is importance of “Special Disguise”, because it don’t seem to be even good.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Trapper (BD) Pursuer (Unseen)
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
CheesyKnives:

To be honest , Trapper doesn’t need occupy immunity. It functions fine without it.

But I feel it does, I was kind of basing it off of hunter in a way btw

CheesyKnives:

Day Ability also doesnt specify which trap will bypass death immunity

There is only 1 trap you have available soo it has to be deathtrap. Again blame 2 am me for not detailing things…

CheesyKnives:

Also , you have no way of switching targets.

You can change your target at least you could in my head you can

CheesyKnives:

I like pursuer though.

Thanks!

Also it should be a better blue now

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Trapper (BD) Pursuer (Unseen)
item.dc:creator: CheesyKnives
item.description:
Trapper from Tos is hitting me hard on the head right now.

It also feels quite weaker than its Salem counterpart. To be honest , Trapper doesn’t need occupy immunity. It functions fine without it.

Day Ability also doesnt specify which trap will bypass death immunity , unless your implying you HAVE to place a trap the day you use this ability , otherwise it becomes useless.

Also , you have no way of switching targets.

I like pursuer though.

Read full topic
